item.title: Shooting a no-budget feature film
item.description:
Shooting a no-budget feature film

Heading out with a very small crew and very limited resources, I begin production on my first film.

item.title: How to achieve faster video exports in Final Cut Pro X
item.description:
How to achieve faster video exports in Final Cut Pro X

One of the great things about Final Cut Pro X ($299 on Mac App Store) is that you can export high quality videos extremely fast, even on underpowered hardware. For example, my Late 2013 MacBook Pro with Retina display lacks a discrete GPU, but I can still export 4K videos with relative ease.

item.title: Koji Color's Brand New LUTs Offer True 35mm Film Color (Save 10% with This NFS Code)
item.description:
Koji Color's Brand New LUTs Offer True 35mm Film Color (Save 10% with This NFS Code)

There are plenty of LUTs out there that aim at giving your films a distinct, beautiful look, but if you're looking for some that accurately emulate the look of 35mm film, you will definitely want to check out Koji Color's brand new suite.
